Adhere.name: Adhérer
Adhere.description: L'objet est couvert d'une substance visqueuse extrêmement collante.

Anchor.name: Ancrage
Anchor.description: Un fil solide jaillit de vos bras, se fixant à deux points dans un rayon de 15 mètres de chaque côté.

Animate Object.name: Objet animé
Animate Object.description: Un objet obéit à vos ordres du mieux qu'il peut.

Anthropomorphize.name: Anthropomorphiser
Anthropomorphize.description: Un animal gagne soit une intelligence humaine, soit une apparence humaine pendant un jour.

Arcane Eye.name: Oeil arcanique
Arcane Eye.description: Vous pouvez voir à travers un globe oculaire magique flottant qui vole autour de vous à votre commande.

Astral Prison.name: Prison astrale
Astral Prison.description: Un objet est figé dans le temps et l'espace à l'intérieur d'une coquille de cristal invulnérable.

Attract.name: Attirer
Attract.description: Deux objets sont fortement attirés magnétiquement l'un vers l'autre s'ils se trouvent à moins de 3 mètres.

Auditory Illusion.name: Illusion sonore
Auditory Illusion.description: Vous créez des sons fictifs qui semblent provenir d'une direction de votre choix.

Babble.name: Babiller
Babble.description: Une créature doit répéter haut et fort tout ce que vous pensez. Autrement, elle est muette.

Bait Flower.name: Fleur attirante
Bait Flower.description: Une plante jaillit du sol et dégage une odeur de chair en décomposition.

Beast Form.name: Forme bestiale
Beast Form.description: Vous et vos biens vous transformez en un animal banal.

Befuddle.name: Brouiller
Befuddle.description: Une créature de votre choix est incapable de former de nouveaux souvenirs à court terme pendant la durée du sort.

Body Swap.name: Échange de corps
Body Swap.description: Vous changez de corps avec une créature que vous touchez. Si un corps meurt, l'autre meurt aussi.

Charm.name: Charme
Charm.description: Une créature que vous pouvez voir vous traite comme un ami.

Command.name: Ordre
Command.description: Une cible obéit à un ordre unique de trois mots qui ne lui fait aucun mal.

Comprehend.name: Comprendre
Comprehend.description: Vous maîtrisez toutes les langues pendant un court moment./p>

Cone of Foam.name: Cône de mousse
Cone of Foam.description: Une mousse dense jaillit de votre main et recouvre la cible.

Control Plants.name: Contrôle des végétaux
Control Plants.description: Les plantes et les arbres à proximité vous obéissent et acquièrent la capacité de se déplacer à un rythme lent.

Control Weather.name: Contrôle de la météo
Control Weather.description: Vous pouvez modifier le type de temps à volonté, mais vous ne le contrôlez pas autrement.

Cure Wounds.name: Cure Wounds
Cure Wounds.description: Restore 1d4 STR per day to a creature you can touch.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description: You can see or hear nearby magical auras.

Disassemble.name: Disassemble
Disassemble.description: Any of your body parts may be detached and reattached at will, without causing pain or damage. You can still control them.

Disguise.name: Disguise
Disguise.description: You may alter the appearance of one character at will as long as they remain humanoid. Attempts to duplicate other characters will seem uncanny.

Displace.name: Displace
Displace.description: An object appears to be up to 15ft from its actual position.

Earthquake.name: Earthquake
Earthquake.description: The ground begins shaking violently. Structures may be damaged or collapse.

Elemental Wall.name: Elemental Wall
Elemental Wall.description: A straight wall of ice or fire 50ft long and 10ft high rises from the ground.

Filch.name: Filch
Filch.description: A visible item teleports to your hands.

Flare.name: Flare
Flare.description: A bright ball of energy fires a trail of light into the sky, revealing your location to friend or foe.

Fog Cloud.name: Fog Cloud
Fog Cloud.description: A dense fog spreads out from you.

Frenzy.name: Frenzy
Frenzy.description: A nearby creature erupts in a frenzy of violence.

Gate.name: Gate
Gate.description: A portal to a random plane opens.

Gravity Shift.name: Gravity Shift
Gravity Shift.description: You can change the direction of gravity (for yourself only) up to once per round.

Greed.name: Greed
Greed.description: A creature develops an overwhelming urge to possess a visible item of your choice.

Hatred.name: Hatred
Hatred.description: A creature develops a deep hatred of another creature or group and wishes to destroy them.

Hover.name: Hover
Hover.description: An object hovers, frictionless, 2ft above the ground. It can hold up to one humanoid.

Hypnotize.name: Hypnotize
Hypnotize.description: A creature enters a trance and will truthfully answer one yes or no questions you ask it.

Icy Touch.name: Icy Touch
Icy Touch.description: A thick ice layer spreads across a touched surface, up to 10ft in radius.

Identify Owner.name: Identify Owner
Identify Owner.description: Letters appear over the object you touch, spelling out the name of the object's owners, if there are any.

Illuminate.name: Illuminate
Illuminate.description: A floating light moves as you command.

Invisible Tether.name: Invisible Tether
Invisible Tether.description: Two objects within 10ft of each other cannot be moved more than 10ft apart.

Knock.name: Knock
Knock.description: A nearby mundane or magical lock unlocks – loudly.

Magic Dampener.name: Magic Dampener
Magic Dampener.description: All nearby magical effects have their effectiveness halved.

Manse.name: Manse
Manse.description: A sturdy, furnished cottage appears for 12 hours. You can permit and forbid entry to it at will.

Marble Craze.name: Marble Craze
Marble Craze.description: Your pockets are full of marbles, and will refill every 30 seconds.

Masquerade.name: Masquerade
Masquerade.description: A character’s appearance and voice becomes identical to those of a character you touch.

Miniaturize.name: Miniaturize
Miniaturize.description: A creature you touch is shrunk down to the size of a mouse.

Mirror Image.name: Mirror Image
Mirror Image.description: An illusory duplicate of yourself appears and is under your control.

Mirrorwalk.name: Mirrorwalk
Mirrorwalk.description: A mirror becomes a gateway to another mirror that you looked into today.

Missile Shield.name: Missile Shield
Missile Shield.description: A creature you touch is protected from mundane missile attacks for one minute.

Night Sphere.name: Night Sphere
Night Sphere.description: A 50ft wide sphere of darkness displaying the night sky appears before you.

Objectify.name: Objectify
Objectify.description: You become any inanimate object between the size of a grand piano and an apple.

Pacify.name: Pacify
Pacify.description: A creature near you has an aversion to violence.

Phobia.name: Phobia
Phobia.description: A nearby creature becomes terrified of an object of your choice.

Pit.name: Pit
Pit.description: A pit 10ft wide and 10ft deep opens in the ground.

Primal Surge.name: Primal Surge
Primal Surge.description: An creature rapidly evolves into a future version of its species.

Push/Pull.name: Push/Pull
Push/Pull.description: An object of any size is pulled directly towards you or pushed directly away from you with the strength of one man.

Raise Dead.name: Raise Dead
Raise Dead.description: A skeleton rises from the ground to serve you. They are incredibly stupid and can only obey simple orders.

Raise Spirit.name: Raise Spirit
Raise Spirit.description: The spirit of a dead body manifests and will answer 1 question.

Read Mind.name: Read Mind
Read Mind.description: You can hear the surface thoughts of nearby creatures.

Repel.name: Repel
Repel.description: Two objects are strongly magnetically repelled from each other if they come within 10 feet.

Scry.name: Scry
Scry.description: You can see through the eyes of a creature you touched earlier today.

Sculpt Elements.name: Sculpt Elements
Sculpt Elements.description: All inanimate material behaves like clay in your hands.

Sense.name: Sense
Sense.description: Choose one kind of object (key, gold, arrow, jug, etc.). You can sense the nearest example.

Shroud.name: Shroud
Shroud.description: A creature you touch is invisible until they move.

Shuffle.name: Shuffle
Shuffle.description: Two creatures you can see instantly switch places.

Sleep.name: Sleep
Sleep.description: A creature you can see falls into a light sleep.

Slick.name: Slick
Slick.description: Every surface in a 30ft radius becomes frictionless and slippery.

Snail Knight.name: Snail Knight
Snail Knight.description: 10 minutes after casting, a knight sitting astride a giant snail rides into view. He is able to answer most questions related to quests and chivalry, and may aid you if he finds you worthy.

Sniff.name: Sniff
Sniff.description: You can smell even the faintest traces of scents.

Sort.name: Sort
Sort.description: Inanimate items sort themselves according to categories you set.

Spectacle.name: Spectacle
Spectacle.description: A clearly unreal but impressive illusion of your choice appears, under your control. It may be up to the size of a palace and has full motion and sound.

Spellsaw.name: Spellsaw
Spellsaw.description: A whirling blade flies from your chest, clearing any plant material in its way. It is otherwise harmless.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: You can climb surfaces like a spider.

Summon Cube.name: Summon Cube
Summon Cube.description: Once per second you may summon or banish a 3-foot-wide cube of earth. New cubes must be affixed to the earth or to other cubes.

Summon Idol.name: Summon Idol
Summon Idol.description: A carved stone statue the size of a mule rises from the ground.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: You become a swarm of crows, rats, or piranhas. You can only be harmed by blast attacks.

Target Lure.name: Target Lure
Target Lure.description: An object you touch becomes the target of any nearby spell.

Telepathy.name: Telepathy
Telepathy.description: Two creatures can hear each other's thoughts, no matter how far apart they move.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: An object or person you can see is transported from one place to another in a 50ft radius.

Thicket.name: Thicket
Thicket.description: A thicket of trees and dense brush up to 50ft wide suddenly sprouts up.

Time Control.name: Time Control
Time Control.description: Time in a 50ft bubble slows down or increases by 10% for 30 seconds.

Vision.name: Vision
Vision.description: You completely control what a creature sees.

Visual Illusion.name: Visual Illusion
Visual Illusion.description: A silent, immobile, room-sized illusion of your choice appears.

Ward.name: Ward
Ward.description: A silver circle 50ft across appears on the ground. Choose one species that cannot cross it.

Widget.name: Widget
Widget.description: A primitive version of a drawn tool or item appears before you, and disappears after a short time.

Wizard Mark.name: Wizard Mark
Wizard Mark.description: Your finger can shoot a stream of ulfire-colored paint. This paint is only visible to you, and can be seen at any distance, even through solid objects

X-Ray Vision.name: X-Ray Vision
X-Ray Vision.description: You can see through walls, dirt, clothing, etc.
